# Combat Fluidness (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level**: [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time**: 1 standard action

**Components**: V, S

**Range**: Personal

**Target**: You

**Duration**: 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw**: None

**Spell Resistance**: No

**Source:** Crimson Contracts - The Assassin's Manifesto (Ambient Inc), pg. 96

This spell allows the caster to react quickly to the fluid changes of combat, updating strategies and keeping on top of more recent changes. In game mechanics, this translates to a +2 arcane bonus to initiative for the duration of the spell. In addition, the caster is considered on guard (unable to be caught [[Flat-Footed|flat footed]]).

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 2 to Level.
